body.p: Which of the follow best describes phishing?

multiple_choice.choice: Someone sends out spam email, forging your address as the sender.
Someone tricks you into typing your username and password into a fake website.
Someone tries to pay you with a fake check.
Someone breaks into your email account and sends spam to your address book.

response.feedback: While this can happen, phishing is not about forging your email address.
The phishing site resembles the real site, but it communicates with the unauthorized person.
This is a common crime on Craigslist, but phishing is an online problem.
Sending spam from unauthorized access to an email account is something people do, but phishing is about how that access was gained.
